scripts.build-admin: PUBLIC_URL=/admin/ npm run --prefix admin build && mv admin/build/ dist/admin
scripts.build-app: PUBLIC_URL=/app/ npm run --prefix app build && mv app/build/ dist/app
scripts.deploy: rm -rf dist && mkdir dist && npm run build-admin && npm run build-app && cp -r public/* dist && gh-pages -d dist -b master && rm -rf dist
scripts.deploy-app-server: npm run --prefix app-server build && git subtree push --prefix app-server heroku master
